movies.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
movies.synopsis: Cal Weaver is living the American dream. He has a good job, a beautiful house, great children and a beautiful wife, named Emily. Cal's seemingly perfect life unravels, however, when he learns that Emily has been unfaithful and wants a divorce. Over 40 and suddenly single, Cal is adrift in the fickle world of dating. Enter, Jacob Palmer, a self-styled player who takes Cal under his wing and teaches him how to be a hit with the ladies.

movies.title: Lilo & Stitch
movies.synopsis: In Lilo & Stitch, a young Hawaiian girl named Lilo adopts a dog that turns out to be an alien experiment named Stitch. Despite his chaotic behavior, they form a close bond, learning about love, friendship, and the meaning of 'ohana (family)
